mapper.sql: number, device_id, first_addr, second_id, state, detect_man, start_time, finish_time, period
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_DetectSpecially
number,
device_id,
first_addr,
second_id,
state,
detect_man,
start_time,
finish_time,
period,
#{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{firstAddr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{secondId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{detectMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{period,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.update:
update tb_DetectSpecially
first_addr = #{firstAddr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
second_id = #{secondId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
detect_man = #{detectMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
period = #{period,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER} and device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tb_Device.device_class,tb_FirstAddr.name as first_addr,tb_SecondAddr.name as second_addr from tb_DetectSpecially,tb_FirstAddr,tb_SecondAddr,tb_Device where tb_DetectSpecially.first_addr=tb_FirstAddr.first_no and tb_DetectSpecially.second_id=tb_SecondAddr.second_no and tb_Device.device_id=tb_DetectSpecially.device_id
